SEARCH
Package com.bws.jdistil.core.resource

Class ResourceUtil

java.lang.Object
com.bws.jdistil.core.resource.ResourceUtil
public class ResourceUtil extends Object
Utility class providing resource lookup services on the default or any specified resource bundle.
Author:
- Bryan Snipes

  • Field Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ResourceBundle
    getBundle()
    Returns the core resource bundle.
    static ResourceBundle
    getBundle(String resourceName)
    Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name.  If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.
    static ResourceBundle
    getBundle(String resourceName, Locale locale)
    Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name and locale.
    static ResourceBundle

    private static List<ResourceBundle>

  • Method Details

    • getPropertyFileName

      public static String getPropertyFileName()

    • getBundle

      public static ResourceBundle getBundle()
      Returns the core resource bundle.
      Returns:
      ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

    • getBundle

      public static ResourceBundle getBundle(String resourceName)
      Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name.  If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
      Returns:
      ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

    • getBundle

      public static ResourceBundle getBundle(String resourceName, Locale locale)
      Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name and locale. If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
      locale - - Locale.
      Returns:
      ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

    • getBundle

      public static ResourceBundle getBundle(String resourceName, Locale locale, ClassLoader loader)
      Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name, locale, and class loader. If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
      locale - - Locale.
      loader - - Class loader.
      Returns:
      ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

    • loadMergedResource

      private static ResourceBundle loadMergedResource(String resourceNames, Locale locale, ClassLoader loader)
      Returns a merged resource bundle using a comma delimited list of resource names, a locale and class loader. The default class loader is used if one is not specified.
      Parameters:
      resourceNames - - Comma delimited list of resource names.
      locale - - Locale.
      loader - - Class loader.
      Returns:
      ResourceBundle - Merged resource bundle.

    • getBundleList

      private static List<ResourceBundle> getBundleList(String resourceNames, Locale locale, ClassLoader loader)
      Returns a list of resource bundles using a comma delimited list of resource names, a locale, and a class loader. The default class loader is used if one is not specified.
      Parameters:
      resourceNames - - Comma delimited list of resource names.
      locale - - Locale.
      loader - - Class loader.
      Returns:
      List - List of resource bundles.
